33f72b1d-7f22-45c5-94e3-158109ad5410.description: Awarded to UBS engineers who have completed the Certified Engineers program, collecting 15 program badges to demonstrate their technical skills, cultural engagement, and recognition from peers and management.
33f72b1d-7f22-45c5-94e3-158109ad5410.name: UBS Certified Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Acquisition of engineering skills, demonstrated by earning engineering skills badges.
Recognition by peers and management of achievements and contributions, demonstrated by earning endorsement badges.
Active engagement in UBS engineering culture, demonstrated by earning cultural engagement badges.

8f1fb5c5-78e7-4543-b372-b3530060c296.description: Silver level upgrade to the Certified Engineer title. Awarded to UBS engineers who, after having completed the Certified Engineers program, continued to upskill and engage in UBS engineering culture, reaching the milestone of 25 program badges.
8f1fb5c5-78e7-4543-b372-b3530060c296.name: UBS Certified Engineer (Silver)

742e8766-a8d1-459c-bf8d-86097cc54e48.name: UBS Certified Engineer (Gold)

1e1dd884-62f3-4213-9c44-fd28d1475a7b.description: Awarded to UBS engineers who have distinguished themselves due to mastery of their field, outstanding record of delivery, technical leadership and significant contributions to the advancement of engineering at UBS.
1e1dd884-62f3-4213-9c44-fd28d1475a7b.name: UBS Distinguished Engineer

badge_template_activities.title: Recognized by senior management and peers for relevant, strategic technical expertise and contributions to UBS.
Contributed significantly to critical engineering projects at UBS, creating value for our clients and shareholders.
Provided technical leadership with key role in decision-making for technical, business and organizational issues.
Had significant impact in the wider engineering community and culture by knowledge sharing and networking.

7de9cd8d-f163-48de-8fa5-82128f315d69.description: The LEAD Program is a nomination-based Professional Development Opportunity for UBS Front Staff Leaders focusing on the UBS key strategic priorities. The program aims to drive business & personal growth by developing the right skill set and behavior and connecting with the global community. The Learning Journey contains five program modules. Participants can achieve i) program completion by completing Modules 4 and 5 and ii) CWMA re-certification by attending Modules 2, 3, 4, 5 (APAC, CH, EMEA).
7de9cd8d-f163-48de-8fa5-82128f315d69.name: Leadership Excellence Accelerator Diploma (LEAD Program)

alignments.name: SAQ CWMA Diploma (WM Diploma)
alignments.description: The SAQ certificate is a proof of quality, which attests the holder is aware of the expertise and rules of conduct defined by the industry for the consulting profession. Participants located in APAC, Switzerland and EMEA will have the opportunity to receive their CWMA re-certification by attending Modules 2, 3, 4 and 5 (not applicable for US or UK)

badge_template_activities.title: Module 1 Program Kick Off: Senior Sponsors are positioning their expectations to the global community of nominated Front Staff Leaders. UBS Program Management Team and the leading external vendor is presenting the program learning journey as well as the concrete requirements on how to reach i) program completion and ii) CWMA re-certification (applicable for participants in region APAC, Switzerland, EMEA). The Front Staff Leaders will have the first opportunities to network and collaborate.

Module 2 Coaching Sessions: The LEAD Coaching Groups are peer groups, designed to strengthen and support participants in their front staff leader role. There will be up to 8 Coaching Sessions with a maximum of 6 peers, who will form a professional learning community in which they support and challenge each other to develop strategies for dealing with relevant personal- and business challenges.

Module 3 Learning Nuggets: The series of up to 8 learning nuggets are thought leader led sessions focusing on important topics around the UBS strategic priorities aiming to inspire, develop and support program participants in their role as Front Staff Leaders.

Module 4 "The Future of Wealth Management" Summit I: This 3 day hybrid conference will inspire, develop, and support Front Staff Leaders, their network, and their contribution to drive the future of Global Wealth Management together with their peers from other UBS high end development programs. The event is followed by an additional 0.5day event exclusively for LEAD program participants with the focus on the key take aways and action items for UBS Leaders explicitly.

Module 5 "“Five Strategic Priorities in Action” Summit II is designed to accelerate Front Staff Leadership’s ability to effectively execute against the 5 Strategic Priorities through the use of various disruptive scenarios. This immersive, 3 day learning journey will enhance diligent leadership so that Front Staff Leaders can better serve the needs of clients and co-workers while driving growth within the business.

c996a4ea-f50e-48db-882a-f7880d202917.description: Earners of UBS Senior Advisor Accelerator Program understand the key trends and embrace the change that is already happening in the banking industry. During the program they were looking at human factor to build trust and step confidently into the future with their clients, using available tech solutions. They were also granted with SAQ Certified Wealth Management Advisor Diploma.
c996a4ea-f50e-48db-882a-f7880d202917.name: UBS Senior Advisor Accelerator Program

alignments.name: SAQ CWMA (WM Diploma)
alignments.description: The SAQ certificate is a proof of quality, which attests the holder is aware of the expertise and rules of conduct defined by the industry for the consulting profession.

badge_template_activities.title: Discover the Future of the Industry - Cybersecurity webinar
Discover the Future of the Industry - Geopolitics Webinar
Discover the Future of the Industry - Artificial Intelligence Webinar

Growth Champion Sprints with Exo Works. 5x2h online meetings during which participants were implementing the learnings from workshops Module 1 into an actionable future growth opportunity by building the project. The question was how trends and technologies may impact the future of UBS? What would be a client's value proposition and ROI?

Workshops Module 1 – Future Development (23 learning hours). Goal: Key shifts in Ways of Working, Core Concerns Framework application, impact of macro and disruptive trends (e.g., talent, digital/AA/AI) on client relations, Change & Leadership tools, navigating between high-tech and high-touch in serving customers. In coordination with UBS Senior Management, Capgemini, McKinsey, David Shrier, Exo Works, Hintsa.

Workshops Module 2 - Future Actualization (19 learning hours). Goal: 10X ROIs, Growth Sprints, Shark Tank pitching, Client Transformation Roadmap, financial Ecosystem, understanding client's needs, shaping interaction and building trust with clients. In coordination with: UBS Senior Management, Capgemini, McKinsey, Dan Shapiro, Exo Works, Hintsa.

8896a0b9-6f52-4309-bf2c-45dd5af7b3d8.description: Accredited in advanced curious, creative and innovative thinking. By achieving this badge the individual has developed a culture of curiosity and the ability to identify problems and solve these through automation opportunities. They have also successfully completed the Bronze, Silver and Gold Badges in UBS University along with having practical experience of this key skill.
8896a0b9-6f52-4309-bf2c-45dd5af7b3d8.name: UBS Curious Mindset Program

badge_template_activities.title: The participant of this program will have completed the following activities to be awarded this badge over a 9 month period: completed UBS University assigned courses, used Curiosity practically in their day-to-day roles, participated in Let's Spark Curious Conversations and shared their innovative ideas with Senior Management to embed change in the organisation.
